## `GetExamplesPath`

Returns the program's example documents' folder path\index{Filepaths!examples folder}.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
string GetExamplesPath()
```

### Return value {-}

Type: `string`

### Example\index{Examples!getting file paths} {-}

``` {.lua}
cocoa = StandardProject(Application.GetExamplesPath() ..
                        "Cocoa Desserts.rtf")
cocoa:SetGraphCommonImage(Application.GetUserPath(UserPath.Pictures) ..
                          "sunset.jpg")
cocoa:SetBarChartBarEffect(BoxEffect.CommonImage)
cocoa:SetHistogramBarEffect(BoxEffect.CommonImage)
cocoa:SetGraphColorScheme("coffeeshop")
cocoa:SelectWindow(SideBarSection.WordsBreakdown, -1)
```
